list_merge.description: Merge 2-10 different data paths into a single output data path. For example, if IP addresses are stored in the fields sourceAddress, destinationAddress, and deviceAddress, then those three fields could be merged together to form a single list of IP addresses.
list_merge.label: list_merge
list_merge.name: list_merge
